body:
Hey Guys, I really need your advice.

So, I have this massive spot on my arm which is hurting me like crazy.

So, I don´t know what to do, since, If I go Downstairs to get something, they´ll probably tell me off for being awake so late(nearly 3 in the morning here), and i don´t know what to do.

The only thing that i have on my room that can help me out is A bit of water and Skittles.

PLEASE HELP, IT HURTS A TON
body_tagged:

title: Please help me with this!

replies.body: + Its turned white and probably has pus inside it or something(Puaj D:)
replies.body_tagged: + Its turned white and probably has pus inside it or something(Puaj D:)

replies.body:
Injury=Grounded?

This math don't add up. Go downstairs.
replies.body_tagged:
Injury=Grounded?

This math don't add up. Go downstairs.

replies.body:
Tell them there's pus. That is a surefire sign something is wrong.

"Just go downstairs," would be the best answer.
replies.body_tagged:
Tell them there's pus. That is a surefire sign something is wrong.

"Just go downstairs," would be the best answer.

replies.body: Im grounded without going out of my room, and they will really ground me quite hard
replies.body_tagged: Im grounded without going out of my room, and they will really ground me quite hard

replies.body: Scream. If they don't listen, keep screaming until they meet your demands.
replies.body_tagged: Scream. If they don't listen, keep screaming until they meet your demands.

replies.body: Ok, thanks, now theyve grounded me without T.v Genius Tino!!!
replies.body_tagged: Ok, thanks, now theyve grounded me without T.v Genius Tino!!!

replies.body: Just go downstairs and tell them "i can't go to sleep because of this injury on my arm" (show arm) "it hurts a lot"
replies.body_tagged: Just go downstairs and tell them "i can't go to sleep because of this injury on my arm" (show arm) "it hurts a lot"

replies.body:
Dang call 9-1-1 you might get even more grounded but it'll be dealt with c:
Edit: Don't do this, this is sarcasm... :p
replies.body_tagged:
Dang call 9-1-1 you might get even more grounded but it'll be dealt with c:
Edit: Don't do this, this is sarcasm... :p

replies.body: Eh, wouldn't say that is the best idea but if your parents don't want to help you about your injury I would call 911... Ask for an ambulance to bring you to the emergency, when you tell them your injury say that your parents wouldn't want to listen to you because you were grounded... It's not reason to ignore your son, if you believe it's getting really bad I do recommend calling 911 for medical attention unless you live near a walk in clinic, then walk outside and walk over to that clinic, they should be open 24/7.
replies.body_tagged: Eh, wouldn't say that is the best idea but if your parents don't want to help you about your injury I would call 911... replies.body:
Hey Guys! So, After all, I got my Oyster Card And I went to the Hospital. They Gave me A Cream and they Bursted up my Spot with a Machine, and now im Happy :D

Thank you guys for the advice :)
